components.title: Alert Dialog
components.description: A modal dialog that interrupts the user with important content and expects a response.

components.title: Hover Card
components.description: For sighted users to preview content available behind a link.

components.title: Progress
components.description: Displays an indicator showing the completion progress of a task, typically displayed as a progress bar.

components.title: Tabs
components.description: A set of layered sections of content—known as tab panels—that are displayed one at a time.

components.title: Tooltip
components.description: A popup that displays information related to an element when the element receives keyboard focus or the mouse hovers over it.
